CWEs: CWE-470: Use of Externally-Controlled Input to Select Classes or Code ('Unsafe Reflection')
description: The function isSafeMethod is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution. This is because it allows the modification of a prototype of an object via '__proto__' or 'constructor.prototype'. An attacker can manipulate these attributes to add or modify properties of Object.prototype. This can lead to several issues like denial of service (DoS), property injection, or even arbitrary code execution.
